title: Can someone identify this font?
content:
Some kind of handwriting? Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/PETER%20II_5842.jpg)

 [‹ LOW - THE GREAT DESTROYER](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47206 "Go to previous forum topic") [I need help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47215 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
Looks handwritten to me, unless of course that second ’e’ is an alternate glyph. Try [Louisiana](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/borges_lettering/louisiana/), [Longhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/longhand_vp/), [Calliope](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=calliope), or [Brisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/sudtipos/brisa/).

More [handwriting fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164821/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/contemporary-handwriting-fonts/).
